Security_Channel.name: Security Channel
Security_Channel.description: This is the CAEP security channel

events.name: Credential Change Event
events.description: This event occurs when a user's credentials change

events.name: Account Purged Event
events.description: This event occurs when a user account is purged

events.name: Account Disabled Event
events.description: This event occurs when a user account is disabled

Session_Channel.name: Session Channel
Session_Channel.description: This is the CAEP session channel

events.name: Session Revoked Event
events.description: This event occurs when a user's session is revoked

events.name: Token Clipped Event
events.description: This event occurs when a token is clipped (shortened)
